title: Projects
sub_title: During my professional life, I have developed several projects with incredible experiences that have had a positive impact on people and their businesses. Here you can find several projects and libraries that I had the opportunity to contribute to, where navigation is possible for some of them. Some of these projects are still active, others have been discontinued and more are not listed here for contractual reasons.
end_list: You've reached the end of the list.

projects.title: Dove Research
projects.description: Website was created with the purpose of disseminating project job opportunities, as well as centralizing articles and works produced by the research group.

projects.title: Iguatemi
projects.description: Development of the shopkeeper portal, the main tool used for sales metrics, service requests, and other features offered to its clients.

projects.title: UFC Fantasy
projects.description: This website was developed with the aim of providing more entertainment for combat sports enthusiasts. Here, you can create and join leagues, make predictions, and compete with your friends, with the opportunity to be rewarded by accumulating more points throughout your participation period, involving your favorite predictions and events.

projects.title: Vittude
projects.description: A platform dedicated to connecting psychologists and patients, providing a secure environment for conducting consultations.
